```{r}
rawdata <- read_csv("./Intermediate/Brondata.csv",
                    guess_max = 2000)

metadata <- rawdata %>% 
  select(Tijdstempel,
         Recorder, 
         Sample_Type,
         Datum,
         latlong)

skdata <- data.frame()

for(f in 1:12){
  
  if(f == 1){
    not <- c("Fuik 10", "Fuik 11", "Fuik 12")
  }
  
  temp <- rawdata %>% 
    select(Tijdstempel, contains(paste0("Fuik ", f)), -contains(not))
}
```
